categories.combat: Augments that enhance combat stats or abilities
categories.economy: Augments that provide gold, interest, or economic advantages
categories.item: Augments that provide items or components
categories.champion: Augments that provide champions or duplicators
categories.trait: Augments that provide emblems or enhance traits
categories.leveling: Augments that provide XP or level advantages
